properties.body:
SOUTH ATLANTIC.
BRAZIL TO SOUTH AFRICA.
1. 55 FOOT VESSEL MUSSULO III, THREE PERSONS ON BOARD,
   REQUESTING ASSISTANCE VICINITY 37-45S 006-51W
   AT 081226Z DEC. VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO
   KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
   REPORTS TO MRCC CAPE TOWN OR CAPE TOWN RADIO.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 3162/13.
